title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
Meet the MATEIN 17-Inch Laptop Backpack — a simple, comfortable bag that helps you carry your everyday items with ease.

Easy to understand highlights:
- Fits your laptop safely: Holds most common sizes, up to large 17-inch laptops.
- Keeps food and drinks just right: Built-in cooler pocket holds up to 10 cans and keeps meals warm or drinks cold for about 3–5 hours. It folds flat when you don’t need it.
- Lots of pockets, easy to find things: A big main pocket for clothes or papers, two small front pockets for quick items, and two side pockets for a water bottle or tissues. Inside, there’s a slot and a key hook to keep keys from getting lost.
- Comfortable on your shoulders: Soft, padded shoulder straps and a breathable back help reduce pressure. The handle is padded too.
- Simple charging on the go: An outside USB port and cable let you plug in your own power bank to charge your phone while you walk. (Power bank not included.)
- Travel made easier: Opens flat for airport security. There’s a strap to slide over your suitcase handle, and a hidden pocket against your back for your wallet, passport, or ID.
- Built to last: Strong, high-density polyester fabric that resists water, rips, and scratches.

Sizes at a glance:
- Bag: about 18 inches tall, 13 inches long, and 8.5 inches wide.
- Cooler pocket: about 11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 inches (holds up to 10 cans).

Good for everyday life:
- Great for travel, doctor visits, classes, meetings, picnics, or daily errands.
- A thoughtful gift for holidays like Thanksgiving or Christmas.

Why seniors like it:
- Everything has a place, so it’s easy to stay organized.
- Light, padded, and gentle on shoulders and back.
- Safe storage for valuables.
- Handy charging without digging for cords.

If you want a dependable, easy-to-use backpack that keeps your laptop protected and your snacks ready, the MATEIN 17-Inch Laptop Backpack is a smart, comfortable choice.
